profile.picture: public URL to a profile picture (Instagram, Twitter)

preview.snippet: short text, it's limit is 140 characters.

data.content: this is a tweet! The entire text of the tweet (Instagram, Twitter)

image.small: public URL to a small size image (Instagram)
image.medium: public URL to a medium size image (Instagram, Twitter)
image.large: public URL to a large size image

video.low: public URL to a low quality video
video.medium: public URL to a medium quality video
video.high: public URL to a high quality video (HD!!)

data.source: Facebook | Twitter | Youtube | Flickr | Instagram | Vimeo | Google+ | Flickr
